  • Method Details

    • fromNumPlayers

      public static GameConstants fromNumPlayers(int numPlayers)
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - the number of players of the match.
      Returns:
      a GameConstant object with the appropriate constants for the type of match.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of players is illegal.
